details.topic: Microsoft Dynamics Customer Engagement (previously Dynamics CRM) development tools
details.subtopic: Advanced find Fetch XML downloaded from Dynamics CRM User Interface to C#/ JavaScript string convertor
details.description: A tool to improve your productivity while developing applications that query data from Dynamics CRM using fetch expressions. Please find the online tool here.

details.topic: Microsoft Dynamics Customer Engagement (previously Dynamics CRM) development tools
details.subtopic: Advanced find Fetch XML downloaded from Dynamics CRM User Interface to C#/ JavaScript string convertor add-on for XRM toolbox
details.description: A tool to improve your productivity while developing applications that query data from Dynamics CRM using fetch expressions. The tool can be found by searching in the XRMToolBox plugins store with the text 'FetchXML to C#/JS string converter' and can be downloaded for your use as shown here
